title: Neo-bank digital onboarding
summary: Automated KYC and account opening contracts with adaptive routing and biometric checks.

media.alt: Customer holding a phone during a banking signup flow

mdxBody:
## Challenge
Fintech analysts uncovered that manual reviews added up to three days to onboarding and exposed gaps in audit evidence. Legacy email-based agreements meant compliance teams manually stitched every KYC document before storing it in regulated archives.

## Solution
- Render adaptive KYC forms with Sign Global's embedded components.
- Trigger signer verification with selfie match when the risk engine flags high-value accounts.
- Stream completed audit bundles to the compliance data lake with the evidence export API.

## Outcomes
**Reduced** customer drop-off by syncing reminders with the bank's CRM. _Improved_ compliance posture through immutable evidence manifests.

title: Remote notarization for title transfers
summary: Digitized closing packets with qualified signatures, secure video attestations, and audit-ready exports.

media.alt: Notary verifying documents over secure video session

impactMetrics: Cut notarization turnaround to under 4 hours
Auditors approved digital evidence without exception
mdxBody:
## Challenge
County clerks needed a remote-first process to handle property title transfers during hybrid working schedules, without sacrificing legally required in-person notarization checks.

## Solution
- Scheduled signers through Sign Global's workflow engine with jurisdiction-specific notarization steps.
- Captured live video attestations and attached them to the evidence packet as a qualified biometric record.
- Ran automatic compliance exports into the county's records system every evening.

## Outcomes
Regulators gained real-time dashboards with **tamper-evident** tracking. Citizens accessed a unified portal that _reduced paperwork_ and eliminated in-person visits for routine transfers.

title: Pharma lab consent orchestration
summary: Coordinated clinical trial consent with multi-language flows and audit-ready evidence.

media.alt: Clinical researcher reviewing consent forms on a tablet

impactMetrics: Consent cycle time dropped from 8 days to 36 hours
98 languages supported with automatic locale detection
Regulatory findings closed 2x faster with linked evidence
mdxBody:
## Challenge
A global pharma sponsor needed auditable consent capture for decentralized trials. Legacy PDF packets were difficult to update when protocol changes rolled out mid-study.

## Solution
- Authored dynamic consent templates using MDX blocks that updated across all studies instantly.
- Embedded accessibility metadata, screen-reader hints, and video walk-throughs for complex study phases.
- Streamed signed packets into the validated eTMF with the records connector.

## Outcomes
Participants viewed contextual content on any device, clinical operations maintained a **single source of truth**, and regulators accessed immutable trails within minutes of request.

title: Smart city permit approvals
summary: Streamlined construction permits with automated routing, fee payments, and compliance checkpoints.

media.alt: City skyline representing civic digital services

impactMetrics: Approval SLAs met 99% of the time
Cut manual review effort by 240 staff hours monthly
Collected permit fees at submission with embedded payments
mdxBody:
## Challenge
Permitting teams balanced rising demand with limited staff, resulting in six-week backlogs and frustrated contractors.

## Solution
- Configured branched workflows that routed commercial builds to engineering reviews while fast-tracking residential remodels.
- Synchronized payments with the city's finance system using Sign Global's payments connector.
- Published a public status tracker to keep applicants informed in real-time.

## Outcomes
Contractors self-served their documentation, city staff monitored SLAs in a shared dashboard, and civic leaders showcased tangible **smart city** progress to residents.
